pageContext.claim: “I would rather interview Bolton. I would rather interview a lot of people. The problem with John is that it's a national security problem. You know, you can't have somebody who's at national security -- and, if you think about it, John, he knows some of my thoughts. He knows what I think about leaders. What happens if he reveals what I think about a certain leader, and it's not very positive, and then I have to deal on behalf of the country?”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is often indiscreet and often makes his thoughts about foreign leaders rather clear, either in his remarks or on Twitter.
